title: Bug 121682: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table to the report that has a group row with a highlight rule and a map rule.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table containing the highlight/map.
OB: When attempting to export data from the table in the attached report that contains a group row with a highlight rule and a map rule, an exception is thrown.
EB: Exporting data from the table containing the highlight/map rules should not throw an exception.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table to the report that has a group row with a highlight rule and a map rule.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table containing the highlight/map.
